EmailTemplate.name: 24HoursSinceStageOnPSWFAC
EmailTemplate.subject: Waiting For Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
It's been 24 hours since the mockup was sent to the client for approval, and we haven't received a response. Please follow up with {!Order.WOAccountLink__c}.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks, Ralph the Rooster
